title: RedmiBook 15 e-Learning Edition Core i3 11th Gen - (8 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) Thin and Light Laptop  (15.6 Inch, Charcoal Gray, 1.8 kg, With MS Office)

product_specification.Sales Package: 1 Laptop, 1 Power Adaptor, 1 Power cord, User Manual
product_specification.Clock Speed: 3.0 GHz with Turbo Boost up to 4.1 GHz
product_specification.Keyboard: Chiclet keyboard with Scissor mechanism, 1.5mm key travel
product_specification.Included Software: MS Office Home & Student 2019, Mi Smart Share, DTS Audio processing

product_description.Full HD 39.62 cm (15.6) Anti-glare Displ: The Full HD 39.62 cm (15.6) Anti-glare Display makes your viewing experience distraction-free. So, you can work on projects, presentations, and also watch shows without hassles.
product_description.11th Gen TigerLake Intel Core i3-1115G4: This Redmi laptop runs on the 11th Gen Tigerlake Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor. So, you can effortlessly work and do a number of tasks on it.
product_description.8 GB of RAM and 512 GB SSD: The 8 GB of RAM lets you open and work on multiple apps at the same time without lag. So, you can let multiple apps run in the background yet open and work on other apps. Also, the 512 GB SSD helps in high-speed data transfer. So, it offers fast booting and waking up time for your convenience.
product_description.10 Hours of Battery Life: The battery of this laptop runs for up to 10 hours with a single full charge.
product_description.Stereo Speakers with DTS Audio Processin: The 2 x 2 W stereo speaker setup supports the DTS Audio Processing app to let you choose any audio mode. Also, you can create a personal audio profile. As a result, you can enjoy immersive sound as per your convenience.
product_description.Operating System: This laptop comes with pre-installed Windows 10, Microsoft Office Home and Student 2019 Edition to let you accomplish a number of tasks. It also has Mi SmartShare to help you transfer files between this device and your phone.
product_description.Connectivity Options: This Redmi laptop comes with multiple connectivity options for your convenience. It has Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.0, USB 2.0, USB 3.2 Gen 1, HDMI 1.4, LAN port, 3.5 mm combo audio jack, and an SD card reader.

review: Satisfied with laptop. Performance is good. Problems came like Flickering screen and search options not worked when upgraded to windows 11 so I reverted back to 10. So better don't upgrade to windows 11 now wait for some more days.
Thanks flipkart for the wonderful deal. Fully satisfied as of now right from timely delivery and performance.

Performance: Today is first day so as per performance level no issue. I am using 10-15 tab in google chrome daily basis.
Battery: As per company claim 10 hours. This is only for light users. If you use movie & music then may be.
Design: decent design.
Display: As per price range best display.
Value for money: Yes this is value for money. Today this price 39,990 but it was 37,990 while ordered this one. But i got offer in Rs. 32,490 in sale time.
I will submit after some days with proper feedback.
Everything is better than other laptops of this range of price but there is only one thing is missing which the Numericals Pad. Overall performance is good. Good for using software like AutoCAD.
I wrote this review after the use of 45 days. I never saw a lack in this laptop and the sound quality is also good. Not heating I thought this price range recommend. Thanks for reading my review.

Good for students learning purpose.
Do not expect to run games in this, only for study and normal office work.
Design is like Macbook with Windows.

Cons:
Backlit keyboard could have made it to 5 stars.
Very good for schooling and office work

REDMI is always best 👍💯

but other laptop 👎

Hanging while normal use. Review under 7 days of normal use.
Nice laptop with good quality and price

Reviewing it after 2 weeks of usage, initially the touchpad cursor was having some issues but then now it's working fine, performance is top notch I've also played fifa 13 with high settings and it handled that pretty smoothly. There is no heating at all and fan noise is zero. Battery backup is arround 5 hours on average and the only downside which i felt is the display, its not that great, a bit whitish. I got the 512gb nvme varient with offer and i think on this price you should go for this.
Amazing laptop, Best at this price. Inloaded with all features needed.
Its amazing performance.design is very nice quality of the laptop is outstanding
I can use only one day battery performance nice display good all over smooth and fast performance
Product is decent , good for image editing, software development and surfing. Looking for a game then don't go for it. Screen should be little brighter.
Good Product, Booting time is too fast & good for coding & the speaker is too good as compared to other laptops
Very geniune product. Delivery by flipkart is too fast thats why i always buy product from flipkart
For being a newest laptop it is slower then other i3 laptops like realme book and others...... Average for the students
This is best Product..Best performance..Good battery backup..Best HD display...Superb Speaker Quality...Thank you flifcart..Nice product by MI.
As Of Now It's Looking Awesome.

pros.Design: Attractive design and amazing build quality.
pros.Performance: The 11th Gen Tigerlake Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor gives good performance.
pros.Price: Good product in this price range.

cons.Battery: Battery backup is not 10 hours as promised. With normal usage it lasts about 4-6 hours.

summary.verdict: Good for study and normal office work.
summary.Additional Information: Fixed storage and RAM, Good for programming, No backlit and fingerprint feature.
